circumstances: During the final approach on the instrument landing system, the pilot descended below the glidepath. The aircraft collided with a tree and struck the ground short of the runway threshold. The pilot was seriously injured.
probable_cause:
Occurrence #1: in flight collision with object
Phase of operation: approach - faf/outer marker to threshold (ifr)
Findings
1. Object - tree(s)
2. (c) ifr procedure - not followed - pilot in command
3. (f) weather condition - below approach/landing minimums
